check.name: JavadocUtilizingTrailingSpace
check.description:
Checks that Javadoc lines efficiently utilize the available horizontal space.

The check focuses strictly on line length:

  • It flags lines that break prematurely before the configured lineLimit when content from the following line could have been moved up.
  • It flags lines that exceed lineLimit, except when the line contains only an unbreakable element such as a Javadoc tag or URL that starts the line.

property.name: violateExecutionOnNonTightHtml
property.description: Control when to print violations if the Javadoc being examined by this check violates the tight html rules defined at Tight-HTML Rules.
